about_the_game:
Hydra Coil is a Relaxed Turn-based Space Fantasy RPG where you explore a miniature cosmos, assemble a crew of Voyagers, and uncover the mysteries of the Hydra—an ancient force struggling to emerge from a dying universe.

Imagine Heroes of Might and Magic... set in space!

FEATURES

  • Turn-Based Space Exploration: Traverse miniature Solar Systems with your Spaceship; fly to new worlds, visit space stations, ghost ships, fantastic creatures, and countless other wonders floating in space. 

  • Orbital Mechanics: Fly around planets, visiting colonies, landmarks, and more points of interest to gather treasures and trigger story events.  

  • Tactical Spaceship Battles: Simple yet engaging 4v4 battles in space or in a planet's atmosphere.

  • Simple Colony Building: Construct and maintain colonies on key worlds, with many different colony types to accommodate unique alien races. Place new structures and upgrade existing ones to strengthen the colony and receive rewards.

  • Grow your Crew: Meet new Voyagers along the way and add them to your crew, each with unique abilities and skills to upgrade.

This game does not have:

  • Multiplayer

  • Playable Characters (Spaceships only)

  • Grand Strategy, this is not an RTS or 4x style game

  • Microtransactions
